Best burger I've ever had! Our waiter, instead of letting me pay $11 for a burger I was taking practically everything off of to make it my own, charged me for a simple burger $7 and added blue cheese I wanted. Now that's excellent customer service! ! Would definitely go back!

Our server, Tiffany, NEVER checked on us until I complained to a busser. The busser apologized and said he would have refilled my tea if he'd known. I should've tipped the busser. I left exactly 17% only because I know how little these servers are paid. I could've left a lot more if Tiffany would have given a bit more.

My first time at Red Robin and I was not impressed at all! The burger was just that a burger. I was thinking this is gourmet????  The fries were okay but the burger was over cooked even though I ordered rare.the burger did not have a distinctive flavor to say red robin! Sorry give me five guys instead......

Food was not cooked to order. The fries were a joke! Unlimited amounts of soggy over cooked fries that look almost black. Silverware had food on them. Wasn't asked if we wanted any milkshakes. And to top it all off... BIG FAT ROACH on the window sill right next to my wife! Not happy with anything from our visit. Pissed that we waisted our one date night on such a disappointment.

PROS: As a woman who is severely allergic to both gluten and dairy, Red Robin offered non dairy gluten free options to me. The bun wasn't fantastic, I'll admit that, but what really stood out to me was that they made my batch of fries separate, and they went above and beyond to make sure that my food wasn't contaminated.  CONS: The service took FOREVER. The woman who took our orders simply looked at us as though we were kindergartners. I'm in my mid twenties, and I did nothing to merit any kind of dirty look I happened to get. Slow and rude service.  Three stars. I would've given 4 had the service been better.

The food was delicious and our server, Natalie was awesome.  I had the  whiskey river BBQ sandwich and my wife had the chicken tortilla soup and both were great.  They have great shakes as well.  Highly recommend.
Appetizer came out cold. Dirty spoon. Switched our drinks. Burgers fair at best. Steak fries would have been good if not ruined with season salt.

After 3 visits over the past year I can say this is my favorite burger joint. The fries are great, and my wife and daughter love it too. I just get a plain burger with cheese. The lightly buttered and toasted bun makes it perfect. The service is usually good, but not always great (we had a slightly grumpy one, an over worked one and another that was great). I can't wait to go back though!
I love Red Robin burgers...They are extremely pricey for what you get, but good eats for sure.

Excellent burgers & fries!  I don't eat beef, but they do have the option to substitute turkey burgers!  I had the BBQ turkey burger w/ sweet potato fries& it was excellent!  My husband had the Blue Cheese Burger w/ regular fries, & he said it was great!  They also have a nice choice of beers on draft, including the seasonal Blue Moon.  It may be a lil pricier for some, but it's a quality burger!
A lot of selection but not a lot flavor. Service was excellent. Bottomless fries on fries that are blah isn't much of an incentive.

I will never go back to red robin again it just seems like there service has gotten so bad.  The first time coming here as you could see from previous reviews the service was great but now its horrible.  We had gotten seated and at first out waitress was great but after ordering our food we did not see her for the rest of the night.  Her helper brought us out or fries and our meals we only got one serving of drinks the whole time and we where there for a hour.  We where the only ones seated outside and she had a table on the other side of the glass so she could clearly see us and I saw her go to the other table multiple times.  Once she did come out her excuse was they got busy and I called BS on the considering they did not have a full dinning room and since we had been one of her first tables we should have been catered to more.  Her tip reflected her service. I have nothing bad to say about the food it's awesome and it's a shame that horrible service two times in a row is going to keep me away from the good food but I will not come back to this location.

My Wife and i were looking for a quick meal in Brandon Mall and I could not believe the lines at all the restaurants in the new section. We ended up going to Red Robin, quick tip if you want to save time on getting a table and its just for 2 or 3,sit at the bar. You get the same service for food and the drinks come a lot faster... The bartender a Young lady recommended 2 really great mixed drinks and walked us thought the menu with suggestions.  The price was good the serving was perfect and so was the taste. The atmosphere was fun, casual, unassuming and the staff kept it moving. We left feeling satisfied and impressed great job... Your on your A game and on my A list!

If you have a party of greater then 4 you better be prepared to wait a long time to be seated. While we waiting for my party of 9 to be seated we notice that twice tables that were large enough to seat us were broken up to seat parties smaller than ours that arrived after we did. When I brought this up to the staff all I received was a " Sorry" and it would be another 10 minutes to seat us. After 45 minutes if waiting I decided that no burger was worth this and we left. Second time this has happened at this restaurant. Won't be going back.

My sons wanted to take me to Red Robin since it had recently opened .I'll start with a positive.. the sweet potato fries are  thin and crisp . My son had a brownie mint milk shake and loved it .It was down hill after that.  I cant have spices and made that clear to the waitress.  Red Robin is known for its burgers so I assumed they were fresh made and real hand made burgers with fresh ground meat. . I ordered the Turkey burger and told them, no Red Robin spice, cant have spices at all. Turkey plain with Lettuce.  First bite revealed that this was full of spices. UGH! My mouth was hot from pepper, that much I could identify. My head tightens , I get a bubble blister in my mouth I often get from foods with chemicals, preservatives... etc. Shoot , I look at the burger and I can tell its not "real ground turkey like I expected... its processed yuk... looks like what pink slime/mechanically separated meat.  ( google that)  . Now I am  really disappointed .. I thought it they were famous for their burgers it would be a real ground burger.  Nope. I ask for the label of the turkey so I can tell how bad this headache is going to be. Its Jennie O processed turkey with every spice and chemical. The cracked pepper was responsible for my  burning mouth , it also had garlic , onion and onion powder , dissodium insinate, bha,bht..and  on and on ..! So sad . My waitress apologized. She didn't know the burgers had all those spices and chemicals in them , she said she did tell the kitchen  not to put the red robin spices on it . She had an education too.  So if you want processed inferior  food --eat at Red Robin... just don't be fooled by the best burgers since 1969 like its a family recipe or real ground beef or turkey ... its not .. its not quality in my opinion but its dressed up with nice pictures and fancy names.  I got a headache and wasted my money.

The food is good, but the service is severely lacking.  The first few times we visited, we would receive an appetizer of fries, upon request.  The last few times, no luck.  The servers rarely deliver food to their own tables, refill drinks, or check on their customers.
Always good food, great service! Excellent options vegetarians! We truly enjoy eating here every time we go!

The food was ok. The staff looked a bit dirty, I saw many staff members with dirty shirts. I also saw a few wipe their nose with their arms and hands. Not sure if they washed after but don't think so. Don't think will be going there again.
We tried this place twice. Seating was slow, service was slow, food comes out cold.
Always get the Royal Red Robin.  Bottomless steak fries are delicious and always hot.
